name: Set off
description:
Set Off

This is our first game-jam submission (BTP Jam  #2)

and our first finished game.

A small indie game in which you have to leave your home planet because you destroyed it by using all your resources.

Your goal is to find a new suitable planet.

You have to be fast or you will be freezed and dont go to far away!

Land on planets to get energy while being aware of the asteroids.

Controlls:

Mouse: fly

LMB: get faster

RMB: get slower/ land on planet
